page.title: 10A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY.
page.content: { A 1st Year Girl at Swakeleys writes: When I wake up in the morning I lay in bed until 7.15 a.m. and then I go downstairs and have a wash,then I get dressed. My {uniform }is a white blouse, a grey skirt and a green jumper. For breakfast I have toast or cereal. Then I clean my teeth, brush my hair and pack my bag for school.I go over to my friends house and then go on by car. I have 4 "double"{lessons}in a day but sometimes I have 5 classes because some of our lessons are split in half. On Monday I have Language, Cooking, English and Needlework. My favourite lessons are Needlework and Cooking. In between each lesson we have a break. At 3.30 we go home. When I get home I get changed and do my{homework. }At 9.15 I go to bed.
